pages.text: Motherships are large, 3x3 Tier 6 ships (9 HP), of which you may have at most 1 per fleet (default). These ships have powerfull abilities, typically with some kind of drawback to balance things out. You don't have to add a mothership to your fleet if you don't want to.

For most motherships that have a passive drawback, the passive will only trigger if you've used the active ability. This way, should someone hit/destroy your mothership early on in the game, you won't have to spend the rest of the game at a disadvantage.

I don't know yet how I'll adjust the total fleet hp for this update. I'll either keep it the same, exclude the mothership from it, or raise it by a few points (probably to about 30 HP instead of 24 HP). You'll find all planned motherships in this chapter. $(l)Ship/ability names may change. Abilities are not final yet, adjustments may be made to create a better balance./$
